channel.title: Whats the worst that can happen?
channel.description:
Hi, i know I will sound nooby but what is the worst that can happen by creating a private server / using a private server? Is a law sue possible? Please help I'm confused!
p.s. Sorry for the title couldn't think of anything better :P

item.title: Whats the worst that can happen?
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Java The Real Java
item.description:
@The_Real_Java wrote:

Nothing really bad can happen lol, unless you call being on the computer for long is really bad oh and if you publish your ip instead of a no-ip or hamachi thats against internet agreements so thats like the only really bad thing

For that you can get your internet taken off you

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the worst that can happen?
